quiz_questions.a: Your calendar as a God or series of Gods - 7 days based on visible planets with associated metals, gems, plants

quiz_questions.q: What are the six Egyptian soul components?
quiz_questions.a: Sheut (Shadow), Ren (Name), Ka (Life Spark), Ib (Heart), Ba (Personality), Akh (Mind)
quiz_questions.explanation: Ba is most unique - applies to objects, visible in dreams after death

quiz_questions.q: What is Abraxas and why does it equal 365?
quiz_questions.a: Greek letters Ἀβραξας add up to 365 (Α=1+β=2+ρ=100+α=1+ξ=60+α=1+ς=200), representing 365 Spirits of Days
quiz_questions.explanation: Foundation of alphanumeric mysticism in Western tradition

quiz_questions.q: How is Gematria different from Isopsephy?
quiz_questions.a: Both assign number values to letters, but Gematria considers words with same value to be equivalent
quiz_questions.explanation: Hebrew 'alive' = 18, so 18 is lucky and words equaling 18 are also lucky

quiz_questions.q: Why do Hindu gods have many faces?
quiz_questions.a: The metaphor is facets of a diamond - this is where diamond crafting comes from; 90% of world's diamonds crafted in one place in India
quiz_questions.explanation: India never had population replaced by invaders - same temples and gods for 4,500+ years
